page.title: 20CREDITS
page.content: Thanks are expressed to the following for their invaluable help for the project:-Mrs.A.Hilton and pupils of Dame Janet C.P.Junior School,Ramsgate; Mr.G.Morris and pupils of Newlands Primary School,Ramsgate;Mr.S.Foxwell and pupils of Hereson County Secondary School;Mrs.E.Dent,Mr.M.White,Mr.J.N. Bruckin(Co-ordinator) and pupils of Bromstone C.P.School,Broadstairs; Station Manager,Ramsgate Railway station;Mr.T.Pigg;Mr.A.Kuah,Manager, Ramsgate P.O.;Rev.D.Willis,Vicar St.Mark's Church,Ramsgate;Mr.A.G. Hilton,British Telecom;North Foreland Coastal Radio Station;Mr.Ash of Newlands Farm,Ramsgate.
